executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Verify two specific changes:
1. On '/order-success' (or the page component OrderSuccessPage), verify that product images have class 'order-item-image' and 'order-item-image-wrapper'. In mobile view (viewport 375x667), verify (via computed style) that the wrapper has width 72px and height 72px.
2. On '/terms-of-service', '/privacy-policy', '/about', '/contact', verify the mobile typography. In mobile view (viewport 375x667), paragraph text (p) should have font-size 13px and h2/h3 should have font-size 16px.
Do not test login functionality. Use strict selectors.
